News Bulletins

Research and Academic Activities

Attended CHI 2025

May 02, 2025

I attended CHI 2025 in Yokohama. It was an incredible experience connecting with researchers and exploring the latest innovations in human-computer interaction.

Visited PCB Manufacturing Facility

March 01, 2025

I visited Jialichuang (JLC), a leading PCB manufacturer in Zhuhai, Guangdong, China, for a full-day tour of their facilities. The visit provided an in-depth look at their step-by-step PCB production process, including fabrication, quality control, and Surface Mount Technology (SMT) assembly, offering valuable insights into large-scale PCB manufacturing.

Scalable HCI 2025

January 09, 2025

I volunteered for Scalable HCI from 6th to 9th January 2025 at the School of Design, SUSTech, assisting with event organization and engaging with researchers in human-computer interaction.

Chinese CHI 2024

November 23, 2024

I attended the 12th International Symposium of Chinese CHI at SUSTech, Shenzhen, where I listened to various talks and explored the latest research in the field of HCI in China.

KiCon Asia 2024

November 16, 2024

I attended a one-day workshop followed by the two-day KiCad Asia 2024 Conference in Shenzhen. It was a great opportunity to connect with professionals in electronics and PCB design. I also gained valuable insights into KiCad and its upcoming version 9.0.

South Korea Visit 2024

November 07, 2024

From October 31 to November 6, 2024, I was in South Korea, where I visited a research center in Daejeon, attended the 2024 Design 3.0 Forum, participated in a workshop titled Listening Through the Body, visited KAIST, and engaged with researchers at KAIST to explore potential future collaborations. I also attended the 2024 KSDS Fall International Conference.

ISBRA Conference 2024

July 21, 2024

I presented my second conference paper at the 20th International Symposium on Bioinformatics Research and Applications (ISBRA 2024), a CCF-C ranked conference, held in Kunming, China.

Global Youth Camp 2024

July 03, 2024

Before formally joining SUSTech in September 2024, I participated in the 2024 Global Youth Summer Camp at SUSTech from July 1 to July 3. During the camp, I had the opportunity to interact with current and prospective students, visit various labs and explore the campus to learn about the research environment and campus life. Additionally, we visited Mindray, a leading medical equipment manufacturer in Shenzhen.

International Conference on Control, Robotics, and Cybernetics (CRC 2023)

December 24, 2023

I presented my first conference paper at the 8th International Conference on Control, Robotics, and Cybernetics (CRC 2023), held in Changsha, China

Extra Curriculum Activities

4th Global Language Day 2025 at SUSTech

March 20, 2025

I attended the 4th Global Language Day event at SUSTech, where I presented Sindhi, my mother tongue. I introduced guests to a few Sindhi phrases and had the opportunity to connect with people from diverse countries and linguistic backgrounds.

Mooncake Making Activity 2024

September 15, 2024

I participated in the Mooncake Making Activity for the Mid-Autumn Festival at SUSTech, celebrating the cultural tradition and engaging with fellow attendees.

International Cultural Day 2023

December 16, 2023

I attended my very first large social gathering after three years of the Covid-19 lockdown in China. The event, the International Cultural Day, was a celebration of global diversity, featuring over 50 country stalls. We proudly represented our country's culture by showcasing traditional foods and clothing to guests and fellow students.
